title: Add “Criminal defense” service option to Contact Us form

requirements.text: Add “Criminal defense” as a selectable service option in the Contact Us consultation form service selector (the accordion dropdown).

quotes: Please also add Criminal defense as part of the services users can request services for in the form

acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact page, opening the “Service You Are Booking For” selector shows an option labeled exactly “Criminal defense”.
Selecting “Criminal defense” closes the accordion and populates the selected value in the service field.
Form validation continues to treat the service as selected when “Criminal defense” is chosen (i.e., no “Please select a service” error is shown after selection).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be modified: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
No backend changes are required for this request; keep backend/main.mo unchanged.
nonGoals: Do not add new form fields or change the form submission behavior beyond adding the new service option.
Do not redesign or reorder existing service options unless required to add “Criminal defense”.
Do not add or modify services on other pages (e.g., ServicesPage) unless explicitly requested.
